document_data.name: Spirit of Wa
document_data.mainbody: The '''Spirit of Wa''' was the [[spirit]] said to have created the islands of [[Wa]] in [[Kara-Tur]] in the legends of the [[Wanese]] people. It was one of the [[Eight Million Gods]].{{Speculation}}
document_data.History:
When the island of [[Tsukishima]] was established by the Spirit of Wa, two sisters named the [[Bloom Lady]] and the [[Rock Lady]] competed for the hand of [[Ninigi]], the August Grandchild.

The Spirit of Wa once banished the "[[devil]]s" who used to wander the mainland to the [[Isle of Devils]], located off the coast near [[Aru]], where each was trapped unless a [[human]] voluntarily agreed to take its place.

The Spirit of Wa was the one who gave the fabled [[Moonlight Arrow]] and the [[Sacred Wand]] to [[Kochi]], Master of the Peach Tree, making him the first emperor of Wa.
